attributes.action: ensure the BBC reintroduces the 'Guess the Year' competition on the BBC2 Daily Politics programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has stopped the 'guess the year' competition, where you can win a Daily Politics mug, due to the recent problems with phone-in quizzes.  This is ridiculous, and the competition, which has brought enjoyment to many, should be started again

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
